HomePage.title: Hi, I'm Kadyr
HomePage.subtitle: A Full-Stack Developer
HomePage.description: I'm a full-stack developer with expertise in front-end and back-end technologies. I specialize in creating large-scale web applications.

AboutPage.title: Let's Connect!
AboutPage.subtitle: Building seamless, scalable, and efficient web applications.
AboutPage.content: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in front-end and back-end technologies. I specialize in creating dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. With a strong foundation in modern frameworks like React, Node.js, and databases such as MongoDB and PostgreSQL, I turn ideas into digital experiences.
